N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.8 - Dementia programs

State Regulations

The department will review on a case-by-case basis the
architectural designs and interior finishes which are required to implement
special programs for residents with dementia. Any special space requirements or
interior features of approved programs will be considered additions to the
minimum requirements of this Subpart. Notes
